channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: An amber alert remains in plac
item.description: An amber alert remains in place after stocks of O negative and O positive blood fell to ‘unprecedentedly low levels’ in July

item.title: Brent council is placing homel
item.description: Brent council is placing homeless families in High Wycombe, Milton, Keynes, Luton, Birmingham and even further afield amid ‘tsunami of demand’ for housing

item.title: Conservative leadership candid
item.description: Conservative leadership candidate says party needs to get a grip after its election drubbing
